ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Sponsorship Opportunity Departure Ineligible Preprocess View Form
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Returns values needed by the sponsorship opportunity mark ineligible forms.
ViewDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SPDataForm.CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_VIEW_SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYDEPARTUREINELIGIBLE ( @ID uniqueidentifier, @DATALOADED bit = 0 output, @ACTIVESPONSORSHIPS smallint = null output, @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYGROUPID uniqueidentifier = null output, @ISSOLESPONSORSHIP bit = null output, @ELIGIBILITYCODE smallint = null output, @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYTYPECODE smallint = null output, @SPONSORSHIPREASONID uniqueidentifier = null output ) as begin set nocount on;
declare @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkIneligibe tinyint = 1
declare @departureTypeCode_Departure tinyint = 0 declare @departureTypeCode_Completion tinyint = 1 declare @departureTypeCode_Administrative tinyint = 2
declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_Departure nvarchar(100) = 'Departure' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_DeparatureAdmin nvarchar(100) = 'Departure - Admin' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProgramCompletion nvarchar(100) = 'Program Completion' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_DepartureDeath nvarchar(100) = 'Death of Child' declare @sponsorshipReasonDesc_DepartureOther nvarchar(100) = 'Departure - Other'
declare @departureTypeCode tinyint = null declare @departureSponsorshipReasonID uniqueidentifier = null
declare @departureDeath bit = 0 declare @departureOther bit = 0
begin try -- These are required for the sproc to work correctly, so we need to throw an exception if the IDs aren't found
select @departureTypeCode = DEPARTURETYPECODE, @departureDeath = DEPARTURE_DEATHOFCHILD, @departureOther = case when isnull (DEPARTURE_OTHER, '') = '' then 0 else 1 end from dbo.USR_CHILDDEPARTURE where ISCURRENTDEPARTURECODE = 1 and SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYCHILDID = @id
if @departureTypeCode is null raiserror 10000 'Could not find the departure type code from the departure form'
select @departureSponsorshipReasonID = ID from dbo.SPONSORSHIPREASON where REASONTYPECODE = @reasonTypeCode_ChildMarkIneligibe and lower (REASON) = case when @departureTypeCode = @departureTypeCode_Administrative then lower (@sponsorshipReasonDesc_DeparatureAdmin) when @departureTypeCode = @departureTypeCode_Completion then lower (@sponsorshipReasonDesc_ProgramCompletion) when @departureTypeCode = @departureTypeCode_Departure then case when @departureDeath = 1 then lower (@sponsorshipReasonDesc_DepartureDeath) when @departureOther = 1 then lower (@sponsorshipReasonDesc_DepartureOther) else lower (@sponsorshipReasonDesc_Departure) end else '' end
if @departureSponsorshipReasonID is null RAISERROR 1000000 'Could not find the departure sponsorship reason id' end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
-- be sure to set this, in case the select returns no rows set @DATALOADED = 0;
-- populate the output parameters, which correspond to fields on the form. Note that -- we set @DATALOADED = 1 to indicate that the load was successful. Otherwise, the system -- will display a "no data loaded" message. select @DATALOADED = 1, @ELIGIBILITYCODE = 0, @ACTIVESPONSORSHIPS = ( select count(*) from dbo.SPONSORSHIP left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIPTRANSACTION INITIATETRANSFERTRANSACTION on INITIATETRANSFERTRANSACTION.CONTEXTSPONSORSHIPID = SPONSORSHIP.ID and INITIATETRANSFERTRANSACTION.ACTIONCODE = 6 left outer join dbo.SPONSORSHIP PENDINGSPONSORSHIP on PENDINGSPONSORSHIP.ID = INITIATETRANSFERTRANSACTION.TARGETSPONSORSHIPID and PENDINGSPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 0 where SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID and SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE in(0,1) and PENDINGSPONSORSHIP.ID is null), @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYGROUPID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYGROUPID, @ISSOLESPONSORSHIP = (select count(*) from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where SPONSORSHIP.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID and SPONSORSHIP.ISSOLESPONSORSHIP = 1 and SPONSORSHIP.STATUSCODE = 1), @SPONSORSHIPREASONID = SPONSORSHIPREASONID, --@departureSponsorshipReasonID, @SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYTYPECODE = SG.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYTYPECODE
from dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY inner join dbo.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYGROUP SG on SG.ID = SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITYGROUPID where SPONSORSHIPOPPORTUNITY.ID = @ID;
return 0; end
